Even on your busiest mornings, breakfast is handled. Grab an Insta-Bowl on the way to work, pack in bookbags, or have on hand for an afternoon kids' snack. Give it a try! product_headline: Kellogg's® Chocolate Frosted Mini-Wheats Little Bites®
product_description: Greet the day with Kellogg's® Chocolate Frosted Mini-Wheats Little Bites® - a wholesome, low fat breakfast cereal, with pieces that are half the size of the original with all of the flavor you love. These bite-size biscuits pack a hearty crunch with crispy layers of wheat made with 100% whole grain that are frosted with irresistible sweetness in every bite. With real chocolate and 41 grams of whole grain per serving, these tasty squares are not only delicious but are also an excellent source of fiber. Each satisfying serving contains a feel-good mix of 7 essential vitamins and minerals to help fuel you for what's ahead. Kellogg's® Chocolate Frosted Mini-Wheats Little Bites® make a nutritious, anytime meal or snack. Enjoy wheat bites throughout the day - as a well-deserved snack at the office, an afternoon pick-me-up, a post-workout treat, or a late-night bowlful of sweet, crunchy cereal. Chocolate Frosted Mini-Wheats Little Bites® also make a scrumptious addition to homemade trail mix. A travel-ready food, this cereal is perfect to pack for lunchboxes, after-school snacks, sporting events, and busy, on-the-go moments. Kellogg's® Chocolate Frosted Mini-Wheats Little Bites® are a great start to your morning breakfast routine and for the adventures that follow.
product_ingredients: Whole grain wheat, sugar, semisweet chocolate (sugar, chocolate, cocoa butter, soy lecithin, vanilla extract), cocoa processed with alkali, contains 2% or less of salt, brown rice syrup, gelatin, artificial flavor, BHT for freshness.  Vitamins and Minerals: Reduced iron, folic acid.

product_description: This crunchy and tasty high-fiber cereal is made with wheat bran and psyllium. All-Bran® Bran Buds® cereal is an excellent source of fiber, and each serving packs an amazing 61% of your recommended daily fiber
product_ingredients: Wheat bran, sugar, psyllium seed husk, contains 2% or less of salt, baking soda, annatto extract color, BHT for freshness.  Vitamins and Minerals: Iron, vitamin B1 (thiamin hydrochloride), calcium pantothenate, vitamin B6 (pyridoxine hydrochloride), folic acid.

product_headline: Kellogg's® All-Bran® Complete® Wheat Flakes Cereal
product_description: This healthy whole-grain cereal is packed with wheat bran. Each serving provides a good source of 11 vitamins and minerals including 60% daily value of iron and 50% daily value of folate.
product_ingredients: Whole grain wheat, wheat bran, sugar, brown sugar syrup, contains 2% or less of salt, malt flavor.   Vitamins and Minerals: Reduced iron, niacinamide, vitamin B6 (pyridoxine hydrochloride), vitamin B2 (riboflavin), vitamin B1 (thiamin), folic acid, vitamin B12, vitamin D3.

product_description: With 44% of your daily recommended fiber, this wholesome wheat-bran cereal is a great way to start your day.
product_ingredients: Wheat bran, sugar, malt flavor, contains 2% or less of salt.  Vitamins and Minerals:  Niacinamide, reduced iron, vitamin B6 (pyridoxine hydrochloride), vitamin B2 (riboflavin), vitamin B1 (thiamin hydrochloride), folic acid, vitamin D3, vitamin B12.

product_description: Crispy rice on one side. Crunchy corn on the other.
product_ingredients: Rice, milled corn, sugar, contains 2% or less of salt, molasses, brown rice syrup, baking soda, turmeric extract color.  Vitamins and Minerals:  Iron (ferric phosphate), niacinamide, vitamin B6 (pyridoxine hydrochloride), vitamin B2 (riboflavin), vitamin B1 (thiamin hydrochloride), folic acid, vitamin D3, vitamin B12.
